::Rodimus Prime/Kup::

As Trelos is pulling his rifle Rodimus and Kup quickly pull around a corner, leaping up and transforming to robot modes. They both land in a kneeling position, weapons drawn on Trelos.

Rodimus Prime: Give it up! Any aggressive action and we take you out...

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                               OOC: Is airly still offline?  Tag, Blacknightmare.

BIC:

Salveo steps into the security booth which is lit only by red emergency lights and looks toward the jail cells.  He sees the damage caused by Trelos, and the lack of damage to the other cell. 

"She's not here, it looks like she just walked out!" shouted Salveo to Guardia who was standing by the door to the stairs with the two guards.


"Hello?  Where did you go?  We don't' want to harm you, we just needed to make sure you weren't a threat, that's why we were holding you there." said Guardia. 

Meanwhile...

Perseus fired several shots at Trelos, which somehow were dodged.  Trelos darted into an alleyway and headed north towards the sea port.

"After him!" shouted Perseus.

Ravenchief swooped down and fired several shots at Trelos which grazed the surface of the skin of his back.  The animal yelped in pain and stopped running about 2 blocks down the alley.  He stared up as his attacker with hatred, he then transformed and pulled out a large riffle.

 and fired. Only these were no longer warning shots.
